body.p:
Winchester Ky
May 28th 1862
Governor McGoffin
Dear sir

The bearer of this Mr. John. W. Thomas will explain his business to you. He is reliable & trustworthy & would be a good agent to receive the fugitive from justice -- He will take James H. Ogden with him who is also a very excellent person We are all anxious that the fellow should be brought to justice -- He is indicted as Larkin but has changed his name in Ohio to J. T. Simpson
